definitions.title: n.pr.terr. Ḳuë
definitions.body: in Cilicia (cf. KAT:2. 257); [[מִקׂוֶה]] from Ḳuë, for MT [[מִקְוֵה]] 1Ki 10:28, 1Ki 10:28 and ‖[[מִקְוֵא ]] 2Ch 1:16, 2Ch 1:16; so Wkl:Alttest. Unters. 173 Gr Benz Kit, cf. LXX e)k Qekoue (also e)k Kwa Field:Hexapla i. 616), Vulgate de Coa, Kwd Lag:Onom. 273, Jer Coa Id.:ibid. 111.
